title: Something very close to Farnham
content:
Hi

I`m looking for a typeface as seen on the guardian/crane tv here:  
 [http://cdn.theguardian.tv/brightcove/2013/1/24/130124NewJuergenTeller-16](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122841/http:/cdn.theguardian.tv/brightcove/2013/1/24/130124NewJuergenTeller-16 "http://cdn.theguardian.tv/brightcove/2013/1/24/130124NewJuergenTeller-16")...

It`s very close to farnham, but not right that one.

any guess?

thank you in advance

Font: 

 Mercury Text 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122841/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [crane.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122841/http:/typophile.com/files/crane_0.jpg) | 158.51 KB |
author: M Magazine

comments.content: It must be **[Mercury Text Grade 1 (Roman)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122841/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Mercury%20Text%20G1%20-%20Roman&fid=a045c3601f0d4639c7f6d16bf599a697&fsize=60&text=Crane.tv%20The%20premium%20online%20video%20magazine&wrap=2)** by H&FJ

That's now known as Hoefler & Co. The partners split up.

- Mike Yanega

That`s it!

Thank you so much!
